verses.roman:
jaya jaya śrī-caitanya jaya nityānanda
jayādvaitacandra jaya gaura-bhakta-vṛnda

synonyms: jaya jaya śrī-caitanya—all glories to Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; jaya—all glories; nityānanda—to Lord Nityānanda Prabhu; jaya advaitacandra—all glories to Advaitacandra; jaya—all glories; gaura-bhakta-vṛnda—to all the devotees of the Lord.
translation: All glories to Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu! All glories to Lord Nityānanda! All glories to Advaitacandra! And all glories to all the devotees of the Lord!
